mapper.select: select u.id, u.icon, u.nickname, u.username, u.password, u.birthday, u.sex, u.intro, u.creation_time, u.modify_time, count(ua2.id) as article_count, count(un.id) as notable_count, count(un2.id) as fans_count from user_article ua join `user` u on ua.user_id = u.id join user_article ua2 on ua2.user_id = u.id join user_notable un on un.my_id = u.id join user_notable un2 on un2.notable_id = u.id where ua.article_id = #{articleID} group by u.id, u.icon, u.nickname, u.username, u.password, u.birthday, u.sex, u.intro, u.creation_time, u.modify_time

select u.id, u.icon, u.nickname, u.username, u.password, u.birthday, u.sex, u.intro, u.creation_time, u.modify_time, count(ua2.id) as article_count, count(un.id) as notable_count, count(un2.id) as fans_count from user_article ua join `user` u on ua.user_id = u.id join user_article ua2 on ua2.user_id = u.id join user_notable un on un.my_id = u.id join user_notable un2 on un2.notable_id = u.id where u.username = #{username} group by u.id, u.icon, u.nickname, u.username, u.password, u.birthday, u.sex, u.intro, u.creation_time, u.modify_time
